alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:59AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Clay, York, southeastern Hamilton and Fillmore Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 458 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over York, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McCool Junction around 515 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Exeter, Fairmont, Geneva and Milligan. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 331 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
